TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_TASK extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 指定在任务板上设置单个任务所需的全部数据。

span.span: Specifies all the data that is required to set up an individual task on a task pad.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关使用 MMC 的编程的详细信息\_任务结构和 Microsoft 管理控制台 (MMC)，请参阅[MMC 程序员指南](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the MMC\_TASK structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
